name: (Not) Greedy Cup
description:
This is Phytagorean Cup, to avoid YOU for being GREEDY!!!

Can you trick it? Or it will trick you?

How to Play :

Use LEFT and RIGTH key to move bottle left and right.
USE DOWN key to pour the wine into the glass.
Don't pour too much wine into a glass, or it will spill all your wine in that glass (and that means Game Over). Try to pour wine as many as you at your glass to get more score.
